reference.shortdesc: These are tasks a DM takes when a partner is promoted or hired into SM role, or when an SM leaves the role.

stentry.p: ​Activity
​Partner promoted or hired into store manager role
Submit a self-service request for device
(Submit a request>Retail store support>Store Manager Laptop)
Store manager is no longer in role (i.e. separated, promoted, demoted)
Submit a self-service request for return label and box
(Submit a request>Retail store support>Store Manager Laptop)
​Store manager transfers stores
Ensure SM takes device with them to new store
Store manager is promoted to DM (or other non-retail) TLA*
M or Regional coordinator submits a self-service request for a corporate device
Ensure SM safely stores SM MacBook until back in SM role
Note: If SM receives a permanent promotion to DM (or other non-retail role) once TLA ends, follow the steps above to return the SM laptop
​ASM/SFM promoted to SM TLA*
(Partner must be in SM job code; reach out to PRM with questions)
Submit a self-service request for device
(Submit a request>Retail store support>Store Manager Laptop)
Note: Consider the cost of the device as it will need to be returned once ASM/SFM returns to previous role
​Store Manager is on a leave of absence (LOA)
​DM safely stores device while SM is on LOA
